title: Construction tech startup RenoRun lands $142M in Tiger Global-led Series B - TechCrunch
content: Construction tech startup RenoRun lands $142M in Tiger Global-led Series B  TechCrunch
description: When it comes to construction projects, any type of delay can result in increased costs both for the contractor and their customer. Shortages of certain materials and supply chain constraints in recent years haven’t helped. So it’s not a huge surprise that Canadian construction tech sta…
